title: Land with a house for sale in Kohuwala
details:
It's an absolute investment opportunity to own a land in Kohuwala walking distance to the main road + a peaceful location.

Property is ideal for a house / Villa , housing project or an apartment building.

15ft private access road to the property ( Good privacy and no disturbances from the main road )
27.4 perch land ( square block )
Clear titles

not even 100 metes to Kohuwala junction

Call us for more details , inspections can be arranged during weekends.
